content: *this soft hat with a roll-up brim has a matching ribbed scarf in soft jewel-toned chenille thick & quick® lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # cctq-hatscarf skill level easy level 2 chenille thick & quick® article #950 *discontinued* *75 yards makes just the hat * *225 yards makes both items in the set * crochet hook - size p-15 10 mm hat is worked in the round from the top down see also cuddle up ribbed scarf & brimmed hat scarf 1 *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cuddle-up-ribbed-scarf--brimmed-hat-scarf
